articles.content: And so it was time to face the final curtain, which include hugs, fireworks and 75,000 crazy spectators. A yellow tide for the final tribute to Valentino Rossi, even when the colour of the team gear … [+4724 chars]

articles.title: Recent Match Report - PAK Women vs WI Women 3rd ODI 2021/22 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Taylor and Nation put together a 128-run stand as West Indies romped to a six-wicket win
